messages.message: Thanks Heymian, is there anything else I need to do on my end? I’m getting an error when copying files:
the permissions for the aws user in this environment isn’t configured correctly with the right S3 permissions. you need to check with whoever is managing your environment to fix this.
@Bren are you the one to fix this?
unsure, what are you trying to copy from where to where again? I can take a look later

In this case, I’m done copying and have everything where I need it. Future copy issues from Dogfood can be mitigated by using the s3 bucket that Heymian attached but right now there seems to be some permission issues

I think you want to check the S3 policy of the AWS user attached to the Instabase Drive repo in demo-2. I used my own credentials for the Dogfood mount, and I should be an admin everywhere, so I don’t think it would be a problem with my user credentials.
